entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -34.1°C
Wind: SSE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 15 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 80 gusting to 110 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind north 90 km/h gusting to 130. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
